project_name.description: A concise, kebab-case name for the project (e.g., 'e-commerce-platform').

project_description.description: A one-sentence summary of the project's core function.

project_type.description: The primary type of software to be built. Default to 'web-app' if unclear.

required_features.description: A list of key features or user stories to be implemented (e.g., 'user authentication', 'CRUD for products', 'payment gateway integration').

backend.description: Preferred backend framework (e.g., 'FastAPI', 'Node.js/Express'). Infer from context if not explicit.

frontend.description: Preferred frontend framework (e.g., 'React', 'Vue', 'Next.js'). Infer from context if not explicit.

database.description: Preferred database (e.g., 'PostgreSQL', 'MongoDB'). Infer from context if not explicit.

technology_stack.description: Specific technology choices, if mentioned by the user. Should be an empty object if no technologies are specified.

initial_tasks.description: A list of high-level tasks for the Orchestrator to prioritize (e.g., 'Draft PRD', 'Scaffold Backend', 'Create Database Schema'). Default to ['Draft PRD', 'Generate Architecture Diagram'].
